content.text: 1 eggplant, seeded and cut lengthwise into 1/4 inch slices
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 eggplant, seeded and cut lengthwise into 1/4 inch slices" )

content.text: 1 red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips" )

content.text: 1) Place the eggplant and red bell pepper on a medium baking sheet, and season with salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the eggplant"@9:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "red bell pepper"@26:41 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-1-0 "a medium baking sheet"@45:66 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "season"@72:78 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "salt"@84:88 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "pepper"@93:99 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Broil 5 to 10 minutes, until tender and slightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Broil"@3:8 / AC
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "5 to 10 minutes"@9:24 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until tender and slightly browned"@26:59 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Spread bottom half with goat cheese, followed by tapenade.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Spread"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "goat cheese"@27:38 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "bottom half"@10:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "tapenade"@52:60 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Layer with eggplant and red pepper, then sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Layer"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "eggplant"@14:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "red pepper"@27:37 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "sprinkle"@44:52 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "Parmesan cheese"@58:73 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Cover with top half of baguette.
